name: Sentinel-Islands
description:
The theme was islands, so I made some procedurally generated islands. Then wondered what I could do with them, and I'd been talking about The Sentinel this week, so I made an island-hopping tribute to that :)

In theory a full version of this would be multiplayer and would have each island procedurally generated to increase with difficulty and be more puzzle-like.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left-mouse (hold) to absorb objects below you
  • Right-mouse (press) to teleport (costs energy)
  • Space (press) to build a rock underneath yourself (costs lots of energy
